parameter.name: threadId
parameter.description: ID of the Disqus Forum to retrieve.

parameter.name: forumId
parameter.description: ID of the Disqus Forum to retrieve.

parameter.name: related
parameter.description: Specify relations to include with your response. Choices - thread.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Maximum number of posts to return.

parameter.name: query
parameter.description: Query to filter the lists which are returned as part of the response.

parameter.name: include
parameter.description: Choices: unapproved, approved(default), spam, deleted, flagged, highlighted

parameter.name: order
parameter.description: Order of entries returned. Choices: asc, desc(default)

parameter.name: categoryId
parameter.description: ID of the category whose Posts should be retrieved.

parameter.name: userId
parameter.description: ID of the User whose posts are to be retrieved.

parameter.name: popular
parameter.description: Whether to pick the popular posts.
